title: Call of Duty Mobile
description: Get ready to dive into another world with our VR event! Experience the coolest virtual worlds, epic games, and mind-blowing tech that’ll leave you amazed. Whether you're into exploring, gaming, or just curious about what the future looks like, this is your chance to try it all.

title: Fortnite Battle Royale
description: Jump from the Battle Bus and fight to be the last one standing in Fortnite’s colorful and fast-paced battle royale. Build structures, shoot, and survive in dynamic maps with friends or solo.
